---

_A spreadsheet or table listing every asset the game will need._

# Categories may include:

* UI sounds
* Player movement / actions
* Combat SFX
* Creature/character vocalizations
* Environmental ambience
* Cutscene audio
* Stingers & cues
* Music tracks
* Dialogue lines
* Fail/win states
* Special events
* Cinematics

# Each asset should have:

* Name
* Category
* Description
* Trigger conditions
* Length
* Priority level
* File format
* Implementation notes
* Version control path
